definition: having the qualities of a metrosexual, a straight man having the careful grooming and fashion habits typically associated with gay men
details:
adjective
- having the qualities of a metrosexual
= example: having the qualities of a metrosexual
noun
- a straight man having the careful grooming and fashion habits typically associated with gay men
= example: a straight man having the careful grooming and fashion habits typically associated with gay men
